title: Appomattox Court House National Historical Park: GPS Directions
body: GPS Directions         You will see a sign like this at either end of the park on Hwy. 24, and at the main entrance. NPS Image   Appomattox Court House NHP is located in south central Virginia approximately 95 miles west of Richmond, and 21 miles east of Lynchburg, Virginia.  The main visitor parking area is located on VA Rt. 24, 2 miles northeast of the town of Appomattox.  The closest airport is in Lynchburg. Tour groups are welcome and bus parking is available.  Groups are requested to contact the park for reservations at least 30 days prior to arrival by calling 434-352-8987 ext. 231. You can print these take along directions to assist you. We strongly advise those using GPS navigation systems to be aware of the signs leading to the park once you are within several miles of the park. Sometimes it can be difficult to find the park's main entrance using GPS.  It can be easy to miss the main entrance and drive into the historic village. We advise people to begin their visit at the main entrance, on National Park Drive.    GPS users should use the following address:  111 National Park Dr. Appomattox, Va 24522
